item.description:
Want to check out some cool videos shot on mountains you can actual go to in New England? The is a great event to get pumped up for the season. DJ, prizes, movies by Jay Peak Video, Meathead Films, Ski the East, Juice and more. The After Party is not just a ski/snowboard movie it is a party at a great bar.

cover charge is $10.

I will meet people at the entrance at 9pm. There may be a line so if you end up in the back I will also wait inside near the 2nd floor entrance until at least 9:30pm. I will also give out my cell phone # to all that sign up.

http://jaypeakvideo.c...

Also we will meet the the Snowsports Expo before the After Party (that is why it is called an After Party). I have listed the Expo as a separate meetup event.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at main entrance - Will have a blue and yellow jacket (HS varsity jacket style) eith "Wedeln Ski Club" logo on front and back.
item.name: Ski Expo After Party - Jay Peak Video and more....
